planning noun [U]
(DESIGNING)
C1 the process of deciding how land in a particular area will be used and designing plans for it: town/environmental/urban planning the planning department of the local council
More examplesFewer examplesThe local council refused him planning permission to build an extra bedroom.Our planning application was refused.You'll need planning permission if you want to build an extension.We've sent the drawings to the planning department.She has a qualification in town and country planning.
